items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: The latest release adds stability improvements and updates for better compatibility across different platforms, including Windows, Linux, and macOS versions.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.22 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: The release adds updates to EC2, MediaLive, ECR, ECS, and Inspector2, including new fields, features, and minor documentation updates.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.70.0 published on 2024-03-04. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes critical security fixes and updates for CVE-2024-50602 and CVE-2024-12797, along with breaking changes in the login module requiring service principal certificates to use the --certificate flag instead of --password.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Addressed language server crash, deployment pane released as stable, and fixes for looped resource deployment failures. Additional bug fixes and enhancements included.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on reusing worker threads for '.bru' file parsing, updating feature request and bug report templates, and addressing various bug fixes and optimizations to enhance user experience.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.12 published on 2023-03-06T21:41:00. The summary of changes are: Fixed io.popenyield() failure values and addressed a crash related to custom prompts exceeding MAX_PATH length.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 25.0.0 published on 2025-03-02. The summary of changes are: This release includes milestone updates and continues to provide a free, open-source, and universal database tool with robust features and support for multiple systems.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: This release adds features like docker layer-wise vulnerability detection and integration for GitLab CI. It also includes bug fixes for compatibility with Docker 25+ and improvements in installation instructions while upgrading dependencies for security.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.39.0 published on 2025-03-05. The summary of changes are: This release introduces the Docker Desktop CLI as generally available and adds support for the --platform flag on docker load and docker save. It includes updates to core components like Docker Engine v28.0.1 and addresses proxy authentication credential vulnerabilities (CVE-2025-1696).

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: This release includes stability improvements and updates to support enhanced development experiences for .NET. It is the final stable release of .NET 6.0 before end-of-life. Users are encouraged to migrate to newer versions.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.407 published on March 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: This release includes security patches and enhancements for building and running .NET applications, ensuring greater stability and compatibility across supported platforms.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release updates the draw.io core to version 26.0.16 and leverages Electron 34.2.0. It incorporates all changes from previous builds.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Handle pktmon captures more gracefully, enhancing compatibility and user experience.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1.1 published on 2025-03-03. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1.1 'PÃ©ter' is the latest stable release, featuring new updates and bug fixes for improved performance and compatibility within the 7.1 branch.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version v2.48.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This release marks the end of 32-bit installer support and introduces several bug fixes, along with improvements like PCRE2 v10.45 and a stable --full-name-hash feature in upstream Git.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: The release includes enhancements like improved documentation, better support for feature flags, and fixes for environment variable functionality.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: This release addresses major updates and enhancements as part of the 'release-0-22-0' merge. It focuses on improving stability and performance. Additionally, it resolves issues and ensures a smoother experience for users.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.1 published on 2025-03-08T02:04:10Z. The summary of changes are: Reverts changelog updates from version 17.9.0 and restores prior state for clarity.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.1 published on 2023-10-07. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and updates to the standard library. It is recommended for all users to upgrade for better stability and new features. See the official release notes for more details.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package along with bug fixes to the compiler and the go command for improved stability and performance.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version go1.23.7 published on 2025-03-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the net/http package, along with bug fixes to cgo, the compiler, and the reflect, runtime, and syscall packages.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release focusing on bug fixes and stability improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for an optimal experience. Join discussions and contribute to the community to explore more!

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces fresh features such as a filter gallery, modular grids, and enhanced swatches handling, along with improved font browsing and faster extensions. It also offers Affinity Designer File import, customizable handles, and internal links in exported PDFs. This release includes over 500 new icons and various bug fixes to enhance user experience.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.4.1 published on 2025-03-05. The summary of changes are: This release addresses a hotfix where import order formatting defined in settings is now properly preserved. Additional minor improvements enhance usability. For full details, refer to the release notes.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest bug fixes and performance improvements, enhancing the stability and reliability of the tool.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: Fixes critical security vulnerabilities, includes CLI and language improvements, and resolves memory leaks for better efficiency and stability.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes important bug fixes and performance improvements, ensuring better reliability for Kubernetes environments. It adheres to the semantic versioning policy with continuous support for patch releases.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: Make is a GNU utility for building programs by reading makefiles, automating tasks, and determining dependencies for minimal recompilation.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-03-12. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 is the latest stable release, recommended for all users. This version includes enhancements and bug fixes to improve stability and performance. It requires JDK 8 or above for execution.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes, updates to conda-anaconda-tos to version 0.1.2, and support for Python 3.12.9, 3.11.11, 3.10.16, and 3.9.21.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and improvements to enhance stability and performance.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: Node.js 16.20.2 (codename Gallium) incorporates the latest stability and security updates for long-term support (LTS), ensuring enhanced performance and reliability.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates and bug fixes to ensure stability and enhance performance as part of the Hydrogen branch for Node.js.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of Node.js includes performance improvements and bug fixes. It is suitable for production use under Active Long-Term Support. Refer to the changelog for detailed updates.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version 22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Node.js 22.14.0 introduces stability improvements and bug fixes, ensuring the platform is ready for general use under Active LTS.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.8 published on 2025-03-07. The summary of changes are: The latest release, v8.7.8, includes fixes for three regressions and emphasizes solidarity with Ukraine in its ongoing struggle for sovereignty, dignity, and freedom.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes artifacts copied from the okd-scos repository. A preconfigured openshift-install binary is provided for installation. Review the upgrade notes for OKD 4.15 clusters before proceeding.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 11.0.26 includes IANA time zone data 2024b updates, enhanced thread and timestamp options for java.security.debug, and numerous bug fixes including improved compatibility on XWayland and Windows platforms.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: Includes bug fixes, updates, and IANA time zone data 2024b improvements. Key enhancements involve security baseline updates, improved historical data for time zones, and adjustments to string concatenation order.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes IANA time zone data 2024b updates, fixes for security vulnerabilities, and adjustments for compatibility with the POSIX.1-2024 standards.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on 2025-03-01. The summary of changes are: JDK 8u441 is the latest stable release, addressing critical updates and performance improvements. This update includes fixes and enhancements introduced in prior BPRs (Bundled Patch Releases). It is recommended for all users.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to .NET SDK 9.0.102, improved build and packaging pipelines, and updated documentation. Key changes also enhance NuGet publishing and streamline the release process. This version is marked as the latest stable release.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This stable release ensures smooth operation across platforms and fixes previously identified bugs. Includes improved compatibility and updates for all PuTTY utilities. Recommended for all users seeking a reliable SSH and Telnet client.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes bug fixes and improvements enhancing stability and performance over the previous releases.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest security updates and bug fixes to enhance the stability of Python 3.10.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on security updates, ensuring the stable operation of Python 3.11.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest bug fixes and feature improvements, ensuring the stability and security of the Python 3.12 series.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: The latest security-focused update for Python 3.9 ensures stability and addresses minor vulnerabilities, maintaining compatibility for developers.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.6 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.6 includes notable fixes such as resolving debugging session issues, addressing macOS freezes related to Metal rendering, and improving test execution for xUnit v3 under .NET Framework.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations; fixed issues with Move Left/Right commands, the extra color button, and minor message typos.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.42.1 published on 2025-03-10. The summary of changes are: Fixed a bug where some special variables caused a type error when used in global variables.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.11.2 published on 2025-03-12. The summary of changes are: Azure Backend enhancements include ADO Pipelines OIDC token refresh. Bug fixes address template string errors and subscription ID handling in some setups.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.98.1 published on 2025-03-10. The summary of changes are: The February 2025 Recovery 1 addresses critical issues from the previous release. For more details, see the official release notes on Updates at code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: This stable release introduces a rewritten console hosting implementation with support for Sixels, enhancements for grapheme clusters, and a new UI for pop-ups in CMD and Python. It improves performance and compatibility while laying the foundation for future ConPTY developments.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This stable release addresses various bug fixes, including ALT-F4 behavior, drawing shift on launch, and plugin menu issues. It introduces folder comparison enhancements and per-file plugin application for better usability. Additionally, updates to translations and minor manual corrections are included.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on not specified. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of Wireshark, version 4.4.5, supersedes all previous releases and includes improvements for packet analysis and compatibility.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Create parent directories when --split-exp is used, bumped dependencies, with contributions from @rudo-thomas.
